DOC.brief_title: Basal Androgens LH Needing Ovarian Stimulation Vitro Fertilization
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Single centre , open label , randomize control trial . - Population : Patients indication In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) follow criterion : - Protocol : All patient test day 3-5 cycle total Testosterone ( Te ) , Dehydroepiandrosetnodione sulphate ( DHEAS ) Androstenodione ( Δ4 ) . Samples frozen store -20ºC later analysis . FSH , LH , E2 , PRL TSH also determine . All patient follow Controlled Ovarian Stimulation IVF GnRH agonist long protocol . They randomize receive recombinant ( r ) FSH alone ( 225 IU/day ) r-FSH + r-LH ( 225+75 IU/day ) . - Sample size calculation : To detect difference 40 60 % ( Relative risk : 1.50 ) pregnancy rate ( PR ) patient low high androgen level respect mean COS protocol , confidence level 95 % ( error α=0.05 ) 80 % power ( error β=0.2 ) , 97 patient per arm need . ( n=388 patient ) . Rounding , 400 patient recruit .
DOC.criteria: 1st2nd IVF cycle Regular cycle ( 2535 day ) Age 18 42 BMI : 1829.9 LH : FSH > 2 Low response background ( < 5 oocyte ) Recurrent pregnancy loss Preimplantational genetic diagnosis indication Any systemic , metabolic endocrinological disorder .
